channel.title: Help!
channel.description: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- On my silab server, most of the npc's attack back when you fight them. Most people like this, but i don't, so could someone tell me how to make it so the npc's do not attack you when you attack them. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @cj_own_u cj own u

alright so do u know wht does?

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

lildude783:

umm… well i dont know if this’ll work or how this works… but in autospawn.cfg … i THINK that if an NPC has a rangex1, rangex2, rangey1, and a rangey2 it’ll move and attack back… but if u set them to 0 … maybe they’ll just stand there and die? i think thats how it works? POSSIBLY HOW IT WORKS! … if u feel like testing this… good for u =)

Autospawn config file has nothing to do with it.

Read full topic

POSSIBLY HOW IT WORKS! … if u feel like testing this… good for u =)

ya... if he's quiting.. why dont we make our own server?
